title: Elucidating the dynamics of carbamazepine uptake using date pit-derived activated carbon: A comprehensive kinetic and thermodynamic analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Ramez M. Zayyat, Rim Yahfoufi, Mahmoud Al-Hindi, Michel A. Kordahi, George M. Ayoub, Mohammad N. Ahmad
